sql_fr_run: with tmp (select max(abs((cur_cnt-prv_cnt)/metric*100)) as metric from (select count(1) as cur_cnt, pr.brand_nm as product from com_us_hub.txn_redist_sls sa join com_us_hub.ref_prd_prod pr on sa.prod_key = pr.prd_prod_key where sa.gl_date between (select min(period_start_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_2' and table_name = 'txn_redist_sls-ref_prd_prod') and (select max(period_end_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_2' and table_name = 'txn_redist_sls-ref_prd_prod') and upper(sa.franchise_nm)='HEMATOLOGY' group by pr.brand_nm) cur cross join (select prv_count as prv_cnt, metric, sub_field_name as product from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_2' and table_name = 'txn_redist_sls-ref_prd_prod') prv on cur.product=prv.product) select * from tmp

with tmp (select max(abs((cur_cnt-prv_cnt)/metric*100)) as metric from (select count(1) as cur_cnt, pr.brand_nm as product from com_us_hub.txn_dir_sls sa join com_us_hub.ref_prd_prod pr on sa.prod_key = pr.prd_prod_key where sa.gl_date between (select min(period_start_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_2' and table_name = 'txn_dir_sls-ref_prd_prod') and (select max(period_end_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_2' and table_name = 'txn_dir_sls-ref_prd_prod') and upper(sa.franchise_nm)='HEMATOLOGY' group by pr.brand_nm) cur cross join (select prv_count as prv_cnt, metric, sub_field_name as product from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_2' and table_name = 'txn_dir_sls-ref_prd_prod') prv on cur.product=prv.product) select * from tmp

with tmp (select max(abs((cur_cnt-prv_cnt)/metric*100)) as metric from (select count(1) as cur_cnt, pr.brand_nm as product from com_us_hub.txn_udef_order_adjs sa join com_us_hub.ref_prd_prod pr on sa.prod_key = pr.prd_prod_key where sa.gl_date between (select min(period_start_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_2' and table_name = 'txn_udef_order_adjs-ref_prd_prod') and (select max(period_end_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_2' and table_name = 'txn_udef_order_adjs-ref_prd_prod') and upper(sa.franchise_nm)='HEMATOLOGY' group by pr.brand_nm) cur cross join (select prv_count as prv_cnt, metric, sub_field_name as product from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_2' and table_name = 'txn_udef_order_adjs-ref_prd_prod') prv on cur.product=prv.product) select * from tmp
Select case when metric > threshold then 1 else 0 end as res from dq_output_table where entity_id in (201,202,203)
